snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include highly compensated at Apple, where four of the five highest-paid employees at the nation’s biggest companies...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include highly compensated at Apple, where four of the five highest-paid employees at the nation’s biggest companies work, some differences between reading on paper and on a screen, and the environmental costs of bitcoins.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Wireless Pain and Apple Paychecks
